Posts.Content: as you see not all lumps are cancer . in saying that it does not matter what anyone says until you get the diagnosis ,nothing stops you worrying . xx pm me anytime .
Posts.Title: nervous for my tests on Tuesday. trying too keep busy

Posts.Content: Hi ,if you do not mind what age are you  , you will find a lot of support and good advice on here  , I have breast cancer and  want to be treated  normally  ,be there for your mum  and give help when she needs it  .my family are there for me  .  remember it is not only  us who have cancer that are going through the emotions ,the family are going through it as well  ..xx Patricia
Posts.Title: Just been told by mum she has breast cancer

Posts.Content: I was just diagnosed last Tuesday  ,had my mammogram within two weeks  ,please chase it up  . now had CAT SCAN, fingers crossed it is only a cyst  ,I am glad I found this site.   I know exactly how you feel, because I felt the same waiting  on my mammogram  .  Patricia
Posts.Title: mammogram ..??

Posts.Content: My mum is a selfish person ,always been hard  ,we try to help her out , but with this happening we cannot  , so we think that this is something to do with it  and when we do see her what we are going through is nothing  ,to what she is she had a prolapse   . every one says  you can rely on her  ,do not know what she is saying to others .. off out to get information for daughters homework  ...  oh what fun..xx
Posts.Title: Feeling tired

Posts.Content: Thank you SianI  and Alaval100  ,have great friends who even being abroad on holiday just now ,keep in contact  ,I have decided to leave well alone and not let it stress me, going to get nurse tomorrow to refer me to MacMillan  nurses .Really appreciate all your help .xx
Posts.Title: Feeling tired

Posts.Content: Hi Jan  ,they make me so angry  ,  I am waiting on Ayrshire Cancer support coming to see  me  , my nurse and team are brilliant  ,,  you move up here ..... xx
Posts.Title: Feeling tired

Posts.Content: They gave me information on every part of my treatment  ,where to get advice , gave me details of groups available  .like headstrong who give you advice on scarfs etc  , to contact them anytime  ,the support should not differ where we are ,it should be universal  ,that is why I am glad I joined this site as well..phone being switched over today , so will call you when done  .xx
Posts.Title: Feeling tired

Posts.Content: Morning Jan,  this morning I am tired ,I got up early , because I could not get my mind to stop racing , then my partner gave me a row because I did not wake him  ,does not want me sitting on my own  . Up here in Ayrshire  , I have now been referred to Ayrshire cancer support , When I go on Tuesday my  nurse will not be there ,but is going to call me on Wednesday ,to make sure I am ok and understand what is going on . she told me to call them anytime  . Glad to have met you , will always be here for you and feel I have met a friend for  life  .  xx
Posts.Title: Feeling tired

Posts.Content: I Agree  ,some one said earlier we need a survey of   support available in all regions  ,  it should not differ  , my Maggi centre is in Glasgow ,have to get 2 trains  , I do not drive but have plenty of friends who can help  .  have not seen my mother in a week  ,but have been told by others that she is coming across selfish  . xx Patricia
Posts.Title: Feeling tired

Posts.Content: HI ,since biopsies and scans and prodding  I have pain in both arm and breast  ,plus now puffy looking ,hopefully will go down  ,my daughter and I are thinking of having a pyjama day  ,  you make sure you get the support  ..catch you later  , I find everyone on this site helpful   .  xx
Posts.Title: Feeling tired

Posts.Content: I am sorry but my family come first and I would never refuse treatment  , I too researched but I know my  Oncologist  and Breast cancer doctor are correct  , I know I have a lot to go through but I will still see my daughter grow up  , I was told not too research , but I only researched my treatment  , I have chemo ,surgery then radiation to get  , then reconstruction to get , what is getting me through ,even the days I am emotional ,are my family ,friends and new friends I have met here  . It is your decision  ,but please think about all the pros and cons  .xx
Posts.Title: To have the op or try alternative

Posts.Content: Hi  ,I am sorry you are being kept waiting  ,I was diagnosed with breast cancer in October two weeks after I found the lump and am now nearly half way through my chemotherapy  , my Doctors and nurses have been fantastic  , but I was like you waiting on results  , you cannot concentrate , or you are so anxious   , get back on to them  , have they done a biopsy yet  .  xx
Posts.Title: Undiagnosed and waiting………..

Posts.Content: Thank you , it is Friday I am more scared of ,when I find out what stage and treatment   ,I know I have to have surgery  , my partner is going with me but I feel my life is out of control  ,am normally a strong person  .   Thank you xxxx
Posts.Title: Staying to get anxious

Posts.Content: Just back from getting wig  , the girl was fantastic  , wig is perfect  but since coming home , I have just broken down , I cannot get my hubby to understand why , when I cannot explain it myself . Can someone please help
Posts.Title: emotions

Posts.Content: You and Aroma mum  are right that is the way I am feeling  ,right now  , just  felt as I walked out , this is it , it is real , I have cancer  ,  . The friends I have met through here are fantastic  , you think am I being stupid being this way , then you realise no ,
Posts.Title: emotions

Posts.Content: MEANT , some friends and family think I am stupid   , for feeling this way  , I do not know what way they want me to be  ,  one said to me today you are lucky . please tell me how   , they think I should be smiling and  happy  ,they do not seem to realise  that  I am struggling just now.xx
Posts.Title: emotions

Posts.Content: thank you  ,just off to bed ,hopefully will sleep tonight  .thank you to all for the support and advice .I really appreciate it  . Patricia xx
Posts.Title: Staying to get anxious

Posts.Content: Hi I know how you feel  ,I have my bone scan tomorrow then meet with consultant Friday , I am petrified  ,but have found this group brilliant  .I feel I have lost control and you have every right to be anxious.
Posts.Title: Staying to get anxious

Posts.Content: I feel today ,that I cannot do anything right ,if I say anything all I get from them ,is it is all their fault ,  they cannot see by themselves  ,today  , I have tried to let them know how hard I felt today was ,  but all I get is how hard it was for them  .  struggling to stay strong today    ... Thanks for the support  ..xx
Posts.Title: emotions

Posts.Content: Thank you  ,I have told my friends that I have joined this site and they say that is what I really need at this time  .as I have already said thank you again..
Posts.Title: coping with diagnosis

Posts.Content: just diagnosed  so scared  ,so emotional  , find out what  treatment on Friday finding it hard to cope  ,Have a loving partner  and 11yr old daughter and 28 yr old son  .  .
Posts.Title: coping with diagnosis

Posts.Content: will  the feeling of being lost go  ,  I live in a small village in Ayrshire  ,and  my mum has told everybody, that is my biggest fear losing my hair and what the consultant will say on Friday , no one has said about flu jag yet  ,we have a drop in clinic on Saturday  , thinking of going  ,,      xxx
Posts.Title: coping with diagnosis

Posts.Content: Thank you  , feel out of control  ,I am normally a strong person  ,I have always been strong for my family ,but am so scared .  Patricia
Posts.Title: coping with diagnosis

Posts.Content: My husband is going with  me , because I am so devastated   , I will get him to do that.  thank you Patricia  x
Posts.Title: coping with diagnosis

Posts.Content: Thank you , glad to have people to talk to.  Patricia
Posts.Title: coping with diagnosis
